website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a highly moisturizing hair mask that's suitable for all types of hair textures and curls and is also a good value, amika's Soulfood Nourishing Mask is hard to beat.
pros: Packed with nutrients and omega-7 fatty acids that leave curls soft, moisturized, and manageable
Has a rich, creamy consistency and lovely scent
A good value, as it comes in a generously sized jar and a little goes a long way
cons: Rarely, some customers weren't happy with the results, but many more rave about how it improves hair texture and appearance

customer_reviews.title: EVERYTHING ABOUT THIS PRODUCT IS AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS STUFF IS AMAZING!!! I got a small size of this in my Allure Beauty Box & used it all up. Since I entered my 50's it seems that everything is harder to keep up. My hair is a different texture and is very dry now. I use this stuff after every shampoo & conditioning & leave it on for 10 minutes then rinse out & my hair feels like silk. Does not weigh it down at all. This stuff is amazing. I've never used anything like it & I will never go without it. I don't do many reviews but this one I had to because this product is superb!! Oh yeah, the smell is amazing too!!
customer_reviews.author: Jodie

customer_reviews.title: the stuff of sorcery
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this Amika SoulFood Nourishing Mask for more than a year now, and I'll never use another deep conditioner on my hair. It smells amazing. It makes my thick, coarse hair feel super soft. It isn't greasy or oily to the touch. It's also well worth the price tag because a little goes a long way with this stuff. This tub will last AT LEAST six months but probably much longer than that.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer J

customer_reviews.title: This Product Works!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have colored treated hair, I was searching for a product that would replenish my hair and help bring back some softness and moisture. I love this hair mask, I felt the difference from the 1st application. I actually left the mask on all night, it did not leave a sticky residue, surprisingly absorbed into my hair. I washed it the next morning and noticed that my dry, brittle ends were softened. I have naturally wavy hair, I even noticed my waves starting to regain their structure and shape. I'm very excited to keep using this product and watching my hair improve. Highly, recommend try it!
customer_reviews.author: Andy E.

customer_reviews.title: its a winner
customer_reviews.text: it's working so good for my baby fine, colored hair that gets frizzy in winter. Better than a redken frizzy hair treatment product. thumbs up. smells nice too.
customer_reviews.author: jean karren

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Makes my gray/ white hair soft as silk. I have been using this for several years now and love how soft it makes my hair and also love the fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff- used it for years!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! I used to buy it by the tub because I would go through it so quickly. The smell is so yummy and my hair is so smooth and the color looks so rich and healthy after using this.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Mc

customer_reviews.title: Shipping fail
customer_reviews.text: My first time ordering this-fail. Product was not sealed overall and lid obviously not screwed on because it leaked out in transit. Lid was hanging on by a thread and plastic inner lid was lifted with product out of container. If I were to scoop it all back inside, the container would only be half filled so I don’t know what the deal is-used/returned or if it vanished. Fortunately a replacement is on the way. Not a fail on the product itself as it smells great but this was my first time ordering it and I won’t use it..waiting for the replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy C

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE- Severe BURNING SKIN
customer_reviews.text: Mind you, I tried it on my hands at first. So did my mom. Minutes later, we developed burned, red stinging skin. Fortunately I had cortisone 2.5% cortisone handy. I immediately, put it back in the enveloped and on its way back it went. Be careful, I am very sensitive and spot test first. So, test before you use on hair. I am in so much pain, it even dried our hands out and feels like a severe sunburn. Try to use only long established, proven, brands. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: BeautyforKeeps

customer_reviews.title: Not authentic, this is a fake
customer_reviews.text: The product is not authentic. The container and product inside does not look, feel, smell, or act like the read deal. Amazon should do a better job to manage fakes.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dunbar

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT the real AMIKA
customer_reviews.text: This is a knockoff or fake. It's white but no scent. And most importantly does nothing to calm hair. (like some cheap supermarket conditioner - ) Go to the AMIKA website. They send out FED EX. At least you know what you are getting. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: 7of9

customer_reviews.title: So good.
customer_reviews.text: My wife (I'm a man) got a small bottle of this stuff with one of her beauty boxes. She gave it to me when I was looking for something to healthen up my hair. It's so nice. It smells amazing. Like, really really amazing. Of course, it makes my hair look and feel great too:D The 8oz tub is pretty large and will last me quite a while (medium-long hair).
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, so much! However I learned that if you buy it from the actual amika website you get free samples of your choosing and free shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Unauthentic or old
customer_reviews.text: It has no scent characteristic to this product. It's either counterfeit or old. Probably the former.
customer_reviews.author: Damian

customer_reviews.title: COUNTERFEIT
customer_reviews.text: This product is clearly counterfeit. Amika soul food has a distinct and strong smell which I actually like. Absolutely no scent to the product I received and it’s the wrong color (White instead of standard yellow). This product arrived in an unmarked ziplock plastic bag, jar inside not sealed, anyone could have filled this container with who knows what. Will never buy a beauty product from amazon again, lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Let's play... what's that smell?
customer_reviews.text: I found a review somewhere online promoting this product to help my dry, frizzy old lady hair. When you open the lid, prepare yourself. I have no idea what that god awful odor is in this goop, but it's nearly overpowering. The high price tag is what keeps me from tossing it. Putting this stuff on my hair makes it heavy but smooth as you rinse it from your scalp, but my hair ends up drying more or less in the same condition before I used making it completely redundant. Never, ever again.
customer_reviews.author: GoodEgg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dry long hair
customer_reviews.text: This is so good. I wish it were a bit cheaper because with my thick long hair I go through it so quickly... I bought another bottle (er jar? container ?) for my mom and she agrees with my assessment. Super moisturizing and my hair feels soft afterwards
customer_reviews.author: Ashreya

customer_reviews.title: It's definitely 'soulfood' for hair!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AMAZING!!! Hard water hair is hard to manage - there is no controlling it. This rich, luxurious feeling product softens my hair, restores shine, and instills some manageability back into my hair. It really does this, which was a total surprise. I expected to be pleased with the 1st few uses then let down, like always with other products. I gave some to my daughter and she really likes it, too! We are definitely confirmed customers now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: a complete mess
customer_reviews.text: was so excited to receive this & it was completely exploded. half of the conditioner was all inside the bag and it was a huge mess. wasted like half of the conditioner. you would think that if you pay this much money for a product that they would take care of it? I guess not.
customer_reviews.author: Kris M.

customer_reviews.title: Kinda sketchy
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn't smell exactly like the original one I bought from the salon and it doesn't make my hair feel how it did. I would just buy from the amika website or a salon.
customer_reviews.author: Mila

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product and quick replacement!
customer_reviews.text: I've been ordering this mask from Amazon for a while now and haven't had any issues with product leakage until my last purchase. It was in a bag (thank goodness), but it was still super disappointing to open up my box and see a mess. I did a return/replacement and got my replacement very quickly and in good shape! This is the best hair mask on the market, so if you need a deep conditioner (which let's face it, we all need!), buy this!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: expensive
customer_reviews.text: these cream is good for naturally curly hair IF you can afford it, I got the smaller one because it was what i could afford and its really only good for 1-2 applications MAX . the bottle is so small for $13 i was surprised. i would buy the bigger one if you can because that mini is really for travel and single use only.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love this.. but...
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews raving that this product is amazing. I have thin, blonde hair that I color monthly that needed some extra moisture. I tried this wanting to love it, but it made my hair feel straw-like. Thankfully, the seller was awesome and refunded me without any issues!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: I first used this while I was house/dog sitting in a client's home. I instantly knew I had to have some of my own. The smell is amazing and lasts. My hair had not been that soft in months. I also use their color lock leave-in conditioner. It's expensive, but about the same price of competitors in reference to quality. I now have "mask Mondays" to give my hair a treat!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi H.

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I have long chemically treated blonde hair and this hair mask helped my hair SO much. It's soft and silky and smells amazing after this conditioner! I purchased the mask at the beginning of summer and went through the entire tub (I got about 3 months out of it) and would definitely buy again. I read a lot of reviews from people that have thick hair so I was a bit worried before I bought it, being that I have fine hair just a lot of it. This mask didn't weight it down or make it feel "dirty" after rinsing and blow-drying. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Horrible packaging but good product
customer_reviews.text: The product works great and smells good, BUT, this is how I received my first order. I returned it for a replacement and the replacement was sooo close to bursting open just like the first product. The lid was at it’s loosest point about to pop off. Luckily it didn’t because I would have been extra upset and probably just wouldn’t have tried for a third time to actually get my product. Other than horrible packaging and shipping, I like this product. I’m not sure if I would order again just because all of my product was out of its container and almost happened again with their replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: WOW! Buy it now!
customer_reviews.text: This is hands-down the best deep conditioner I've ever used. I have balayage hair (and long hair) so I need a good conditioner to keep my hair looking healthy and soft. I have used this both as a mask and as a "regular" conditioner, and I have to say, you don't have to leave it on long for it to work. It easily detangles your hair and makes it super soft after rinsing and drying. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: CTL

customer_reviews.title: Ok conditioner but too expensive
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not worth the money for the amount you get.
customer_reviews.author: Keri

customer_reviews.title: My go to nourishment for tresses
customer_reviews.text: I find Amika's soulful nursing mask the best thing for hair I've ever used. I found it excellent for taming the grey hairs that are beginning to appear in my hair too! I like it so much that I have given it as gifts to my friends across the US.
customer_reviews.author: Caridad

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not large enough!!!  way too small
customer_reviews.text: I love this product too bad it’s super super small. I feel like I was tricked. It’s a trial size.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!! My hair feels amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love this treatment for my hair i use it about 2 times a week maybe 3 and makes my hair feel soft and stronger after using it for a month bought this in a travel size at a store and found it full size on Amazon it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: kelly newton

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This product melts in your hair. Great for kinky curly hair. This size lasts about 8 uses when used liberally.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brought my hair back to life!
customer_reviews.text: Brought my hair back to life! I was having trouble with dryness after not getting my hair done for so long due to shelter-in-place orders. Used this twice and I really noticed a difference. My hair feels soft and healthy again. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Silky Smooth Hair
customer_reviews.text: I love this hair mask. I have long highlighted hair and wash it every other day. I use the Amika hair mask every time I wash. Sometimes I leave it on for longer if I want to use it as a mask vs an every day conditioner. It is not too heavy but helps create silky smooth hair. It smells and feels great!
customer_reviews.author: Megan S

customer_reviews.title: It’s not like the Sephora one
customer_reviews.text: This conditioner I ordered from amazon does not smell like the one I got from Sephora. It smells like cheap plastic. Horrible smell. Never buying it from amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unsure
customer_reviews.text: Still unsure- the first few washes with this my hair was super soft and fluffy. Then it was super dry - it could have been due to the change in weather, however this is supposed to prevent the dryness. Will keep using to see how it goes over the next few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A

customer_reviews.title: Smells lovely and works great
customer_reviews.text: Smells heavenly and makes your hair so soft. I took this on a recent trip to Cozumel where I lived in saltwater daily. I used this daily as a leave in conditioner and my hair was in perfect condition!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi S.

customer_reviews.title: Really great product!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! I read about it on BuzzFeed and thought I’d give it a try. It smells amazing and leaves your hair feeling silky smooth. Winter tends to dry my hair out and leave dull. This stuff nourishes my hair and leaves it looking great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A deep conditioner definitely worth the price tag!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. I tried it for the first time this past week and it softened my hair as it deep conditioned. My hair continues to feel soft and conditioned throughout the whole week after using it! I would definitely recommend this product for anyone with naturally dry curly hair!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole E. Welton

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not real
customer_reviews.text: I love this product because it smells amazing and makes my hair soft, HOWEVER, this is a knockoff version. I got the real stuff from beauty brands today and it's a completely different color, texture, and scent. The real stuff is also $28, so you're better off just getting that.
customer_reviews.author: Reese

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this conditioner. The fact that my hair gets so soft and smells so great, plus it helps tame my frizz, doesn't take it away but helps manage it.
customer_reviews.author: R.L. Carlo

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff does wonders to your hair. I have very thick hair that tends to dry out easily. After using this product my hair is smooth and soft for days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well, still smells good
customer_reviews.text: I love Amika hair products, i have the shampoo, conditioner and the dry shampoo spray. The scent of the mask is not quite the same as the other products, but it definitely made my hair SO soft. I love it and would recommend it to anyone looking for a good repair mask.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Mestre

customer_reviews.title: I Love This Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this hair mask and use it every time I wash my hair. I have a lot of fine curly hair that gets weighed down if the formula is too heavy but this is perfect for my hair type. I love the brand in general.
customer_reviews.author: Mairib216

customer_reviews.title: OK, not amazing.
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell. I have thick, but straight hair. Some conditioner, once rinsed, you can still easily glide your fingers through; that is what I want. I can't do that with this. Once rinses, it does feel like it's gone.
customer_reviews.author: Scottie Monteiro

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Helps restore my hair whenever it seems overly heat damaged, malnourished or broken. Feels great and makes my hair super shiny and healthy!
customer_reviews.author: Hello_Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Poorly packaged
customer_reviews.text: When I received my product the top was damaged and it was leaking in the bag
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Authentic and it works!
customer_reviews.text: I was apprehensive about buying beauty products on amazon due to so many fakes however this one is true and authentic that WORKED Wonders on my hydrating my recent damaged hair from oleplex. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: MD.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: A friend gave me a sample, and I am now hooked. Great product if you want your hair silky smooth. Doesn't take much tho.
customer_reviews.author: Nan K

customer_reviews.title: Love the scent
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas present for my mom. Best damn smelling goop I have ever laid my nostrils on! If I could live with a coke pinky nail sized dab of it on my upper lip I would be a happy man...
customer_reviews.author: MeatDragon

customer_reviews.title: My go to hair mask!
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by my hair dresser, now I use it weekly and it keep my hair in great condition even while I work towards silver ombré
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dry hair.
customer_reviews.text: This makes my hair SO soft. I’ve had my hair bleached many times and my hair needed some help. This made my hair SO SO soft. I have thick hair and this didn’t weigh it down
customer_reviews.author: Catie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: I have fine hair. My hair has also become very dry since I moved to So CA. I have tried MANY conditions. With this product, my hair is soft and supple and easy to style. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: MaryElizabeth Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Really the best.
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny. I have dry hair and have tried everything. I just went to have my hair done my hair dresser even told me your hair feels great! I use it with Olaplex bond corrector.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren I McInnes

customer_reviews.title: Love it as a deep conditioner.
customer_reviews.text: 2oz size. Worked great. Came with original seal intact on tube. Used as a deep conditioner with a cap and loved the results. Great for high porocity hair. Will try as a daily conditioner next.
customer_reviews.author: Andaki

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Amika products is the absolute best!!! My hair was fried from so much bleach and after only 2 washes I could tell a big difference in my hair and after 7 washes it was like I never bleached my hair
customer_reviews.author: crystal sodder

customer_reviews.title: very hydrating!
customer_reviews.text: this is my go to conditioner, I use it every time I wash my hair and it always leaves it feeling soft and hydrated! a little expensive but worth it in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Best product for my hair
customer_reviews.text: Make my hair very smooth, just need to keep it for while after washing. I’m 44 years old, but my hair looks better now than before.
customer_reviews.author: Zhanna

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, I have frizzy dry hair and when I use this it really works
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Santoyo

customer_reviews.title: Amika is the answer
customer_reviews.text: Amika masks have changed my life. I have fine bleach damaged hair that i cant even run a brush thru when wet and this stuff saved my life. Their dry shampoo is amazing also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I use it once a week and I'm so happy my hair dresser told me about it.
customer_reviews.author: Lovelylady

customer_reviews.title: WTH
customer_reviews.text: Purchased early March so that when I finished the jar I was currently using I would have it already to go. I’m hoping this seller is not a scammer as whatever is in this one looks nothing like the salon purchased one I just finished.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Neis

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice
customer_reviews.text: Smells great! Don’t notice too much of a difference with my hair though.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Makes my very thick and long hair super soft and shiny
customer_reviews.author: Miss Erin Faye

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: This just didn't work for my hair. I heard how good it was...but it made my hair dry???
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Okay product
customer_reviews.text: Not a huge fan. It’s a good conditioner, but I didn’t notice a change in the way my hair felt. My hair has been very dry and I though this would bring it back to life.
customer_reviews.author: MJS

customer_reviews.title: Great hait mask!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great weekly hair mask. Not greasy and smells super good. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: That's too bad
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used the product yet and I'm still excited to, but 1/3 of it is missing from the container. Like someone either took a scoop out of it, or they didn't fill it up all the way... I don't know. It wouldn't be a big deal if it wasn't so expensive. :(
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas DiMarco

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Totally worth the extra money my hair is moisturized and bouncy! I have 4C hair so that's saying something!
customer_reviews.author: Sizzle_smackk

customer_reviews.title: Smooth shine and beautiful subtle scent.
customer_reviews.text: Every time I use the product, my hair feels so soft and it’s much easier to brush through. I have long straight hair but it has been dyed so it needs some extra TLC. This mask was recommended to a friend; I initially balked at the price but it’s been at least a few months and it’s nowhere near to running out.
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I got a small package as a sample in a Sephora gift set and had to get more! Great for dry hair that needs a pick me up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!  I will never go without this product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this every time I wash my hair feels great smells amazing. I would not be able to comb thru my hair without it!!! Thank you for this wonderful product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jelenia Crenshaw

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell, love the brand, but for the cost might as well just keep using their regular conditioner
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Smells good.
customer_reviews.text: Great smell, I used it as a conditioner every time I shower and let it sit in my hair for about 10 minutes each time. My hair feels soft.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Get some
customer_reviews.text: This stuff makes my hair feel awesome. It also smells really good. I had a small travel size thing from Sephora and when that was gone I had to buy this!! You only need a little—like the size of a dime or nickel. If you use more than that it’s too much.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Loar

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great smell
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love Amika products. I use this soulfood nourishing cream once a week, works great!
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This makes my hair so soft and not oily it is lasting me a while.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Worth every Dollar
customer_reviews.text: The only mask I have found to date to make my thick color treated hair soft and manageable. Expensive but worth every penny...actually dollar....
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Horst

customer_reviews.title: Not a good value
customer_reviews.text: Total waste of money. This is a travel size item. 13 dollars for a travel size shampoo is ridiculous. I could have gotten oribe for cheaper
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Its my absolute favorite hair mask!! Repairs your hair and makes it soft and shiny!!
customer_reviews.author: Ilean Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: HAIR SO SOFT
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended to me by my hairstylist and I’m So glad I listened. Does a great job on my brittle bleached blond hair. My hair is so soft and a lot less freeze.
customer_reviews.author: Cali ⭐️

customer_reviews.title: Great Hair Mask
customer_reviews.text: I have a pretty long hair that splits in the end, so I've been looking around long to find the hair product that will work for me. I am using this product as a substitute of hair conditioner, and so far I'm satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: KatieK

customer_reviews.title: It's great
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask. Smells amazing & leaves my hair super soft
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love this and will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Great hair mask. Leaves my usually dry frizzy hair smooth and shiny.
customer_reviews.author: ECK

customer_reviews.title: Great !
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask - helps with frizz on my thick corse hair !
customer_reviews.author: danica smith

customer_reviews.title: Over priced!
customer_reviews.text: Over priced! You can get Maui deep hair mask that has the same things for a fourth of the price and the triple of the quantity. Ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: NEL

customer_reviews.title: Best conditioner ever
customer_reviews.text: This product is IT .... I HAVE VERY NAPPY HAIR THAT GETS TANGLED EASILY and sometimes even get matted up .... I put this conditioner on left it in 20 mins and all the knots came completely out I comb through it at ease . Also this product leaves your hair very shiny and smelling good ITS TRUELY THE BEST CONDITIONER I EVER TRIED
customer_reviews.author: debra harris

customer_reviews.title: stringy hair
customer_reviews.text: Way too greasy and very hard to wash out of my rather dry hair.
customer_reviews.author: Shanancy

customer_reviews.title: smells wonderful, makes your hair so soft!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this product in a small size as part of a gift box and have been using ever since! I use once a week to condition my hair - it makes your hair soft and shiny - no residue. You only need a little bit so the jar lasts a long time. LOVE this product!
customer_reviews.author: liljude

customer_reviews.title: Too Opened in shipping
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in a ziploc bag inside the box which is great, however the lid did not stay tight during shipping and the mask leaked into the bag. I’d recommend taping the lid as well to avoid the top opening during shipment.
customer_reviews.author: Darin L.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Really good.makes my hair smells really good and very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Mah Freitas

customer_reviews.title: Great for price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Not too thick and doesn’t leave my thin hair feeling heavy after use. I use 1x week and love the results.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Great hair mask
customer_reviews.text: OHad a sample & loved this product -Amazon had best price for this large jar
customer_reviews.author: Julie Buehler

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The best hair hydration. I love the smell. It smells so good. I have curly And fine hair and works pretty good for my hair. So far, one of the best purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana Ardito

customer_reviews.title: No difference in hair
customer_reviews.text: Used it once and notice zero difference. Gonna give it another shot.
customer_reviews.author: am24

customer_reviews.title: needs better packaging
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent. Hate that I received it like this. Didn’t bother with a replacement because I didn’t wanna go through the hassle and would probably just receive another one like this so Definitely not ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Khrystal D.

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. My hair is so much softer and more manageable
customer_reviews.author: Danielle H

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Conditioner!
customer_reviews.text: I love Amika, and this is my very most favorite conditioner from them! Smells great, isn't too heavy, and totally hydrates my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey

customer_reviews.title: Softens colored hair:)
customer_reviews.text: This is the conditioner I’ve been waiting for! It makes my highlights soft.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Hawbaker

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: A bit too thick in consistency and at times difficult to spread, but overall a good buy. I don’t know if I would but again or not though, might try something different since it wasn’t exactly cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good conditioner
customer_reviews.text: This is great conditioner for dry hair. It cuts down on frizz.
customer_reviews.author: Craz3 Jan3

product_meta.title: amika soulfood nourishing Mask, 8 Fl oz
product_meta.description:
amika Soulfood Nourishing Mask deeply conditions and hydrates hair by delivering nutrients deep into hair’s cortex. The result is long lasting softness, shine, elasticity and manageability. Key Ingredients: Sea buckthorn berry is rich in vitamin C and A, antioxidants and healthy omega fatty acids, including the essential omega-7. Jojoba seed oil fills in cracks on the cuticle surface. Vitamin C reduces the formation of free radicals. Free of MIT/MCI, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, triclocarban, aluminum, talc, sulfates, parabens, phthalates, gluten, mineral oil, sodium chloride, petrochemicals and artificial colors. Has less than one percent synthetic fragrances. Vegetarian-friendly and cruelty-free. Safe for color-treated, Brazilian-treated and keratin-treated hair.

BRAND STORY
amika was founded by industry OUTSIDERS in Williamsburg, Brooklyn in 2007 and is the antithesis of a typical beauty brand. Instead of purveying unattainable perfection we believe in a totally individual version of beauty.
